alert.note: Alert for Falls; McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 21 at 7:05PM CDT until March 21 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MCLENNAN AND NORTHWESTERN FALLS COUNTIES... At 705 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Bruceville-Eddy, or 11 miles south of Hewitt, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Lorena around 715 PM CDT. Hewitt and Golinda around 720 PM CDT. Robinson around 725 PM CDT. Beverly Hills around 730 PM CDT. Riesel around 735 PM CDT. Waco around 740 PM CDT. Hallsburg around 745 PM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
